sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The resolver, or, A short vvord, to the large question of the times. Concerning the Parliament: and confirming the proceedings about the King. Being, a letter written to a deare friend, tending to satisfie him. At least, to shew the authour rationall, in approving the proceedings of the Army. / Imprimatur Gilbert Mabbot. N. T.
8 p.
Printed by I.C. and are to be sold at the Crown in Popes-head-Alley, London : 1648 [i.e. 1649]
Signed at end: N.T. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 23". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

Printed by I.C. and are to be sold at the Crown in Popes-head-Alley, London : 1648 [i.e. 1649]

the Crown in Popes-head-Alley
